[Why Doesn't a Market Exist?]{.slide-title}

<hr>

:::::{.columns}

::: {.column}

:::{.center-text}
**Prior Supply Barriers**
:::

- Limited Fishery Data

- Limited Oceanographic Data

<br>

:::{.center-text}
**Prior Demand Barriers**
:::

- Disaster Relief provided protection, but is unpopular now

:::

::: {.column .fragment}

:::{.center-text}
**Current Supply Barriers**

:::

- Trying to One-to-One apply agriculture index insurance onto fisheries

- Information and Innovation Constraint

    - I don't think insurance companies understand fisheries
    
:::{.center-text}
**Current Demand Barriers**
:::

- Budget constraints

:::

:::::

:::{.fragment}
***Supply has the largest barrier primarily stemming from data and methodological limitations***
:::

## {#crabloss-1 data-menu-title="Fishery Loss"}

[What years would you classify as a loss?]{.slide-title}

<hr>

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
load(here::here('data','fisheries','cali_catch_detrend.rda'))

cali_catch %>% 
  filter(species_code=='DCRB') %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=year,y=landings_mt))+
  geom_line(size=3,color='black')+
  theme_classic()+
  labs(x='',y='Landings (MT)')+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(1985,2023,by=2))+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle=45,vjust=0,size=21),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size=21),
        axis.title = element_text(size=23))
```
